What I also care about is the width of the level name column, which is fixed in your code as 8. That makes it look awkward when I only have a couple of records with short names together (there is a big gap between the level name and message). 

If your proposal is acceptable, is it also possible/acceptable to adjust that width to the max length of all available level names (with the one redefined in the handler subclass)?
I'd suggest adding a level_width parameter to the LogRender class. You could calculate the maximum width required in the handler.
Make sense. Let me give it a try.
